text: 8:43 1 Samuel 17:46; 2 Atriviba 19:19; Onger Akaba 67:2O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ uan Nguibamɨn iti, egh nɨ men dɨmdiam baragh, egh bizir me damuasa nɨn azangsɨzibar amu. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e Israelia, nɨn gumazamiziba, e ami moghɨn, nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar nɨ gɨfogh egh nɨn atiating nɨn apengan ikiam. Egh me fogh suam, Dɨpenir kɨ ingarizir kam, kar nɨn Dɨpenimra, eghtɨ an aven nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba me nɨn boroghɨra izam.
